prompt_infos.name: greetings
prompt_infos.description: Basic greetings from user, eg. Hi, Hello etc.

prompt_infos.name: mulyankan_working
prompt_infos.description: Basic working of mulyankan gpt, eg. how mulyankan gpt works?

prompt_infos.name: event_handling
prompt_infos.description: Effect/Impact of events on market/stocks, eg. Impact of any event on market or stocks, How will the global warming impact the stocks, What do you think of XYZ event?/What is your election prediction?

prompt_infos.name: future_question
prompt_infos.description: Answers any question asked in future tense or asking for a prediction eg. What will be future performance ? What is future performance for MARINA / STYLE / FACTOR SELECTION  ?

prompt_infos.name: mid_small_large_cap_back_testing
prompt_infos.description: What is the performance of your Market cap allocation/ back-tested result of your Large : Mid : Small allocation ? What is the outcome if I have listened to your Large : Mid : Small alloation ratio/ view ?

prompt_infos.name: future_performance_market_cap
prompt_infos.description: What will be future performance of Market cap allocation based on system ?

prompt_infos.name: future_performance_debt
prompt_infos.description: What will be future performance of debt? What will be future performance of Fixed income based/Debt Allocation on your guidance ?

prompt_infos.name: stock_tips_future_options_multibagger
prompt_infos.description: What is your tip on stock ? Suggest me any best stock to buy ? What are multibagger stock according to you ? Any stock idea ? Which stock wil you recommend ? Any future and option trading strategy ? Shall I buy put or call ? Shall I sell put or call ?

prompt_infos.name: detailed_working
prompt_infos.description: I want to see detailed working and underlying rationale / I want too see the scores and anlytics / I want to see the framework and system / I want to see output on the basis of which this guidance are given by Mulyankan GPT ? If i want to undestand in detail , what should i do ?

prompt_infos.name: subscription_query
prompt_infos.description: what are Platform key deliverables ? What will I get on subscription ?

prompt_infos.name: delivery_process
prompt_infos.description: What is your Delivery process ?

prompt_infos.name: subscription_cost
prompt_infos.description: What is subscription cost/pricing/plan ? How much I have to pay for subscription ?

prompt_infos.name: STP_tenure
prompt_infos.description: What should be my STP tenure ? Kitne samay ki stp karu ? How many month shall I do stp ? Kab tak stp karu ? For how many month shall I run stp ? When shall I start or stop stp ?

prompt_infos.name: Basis_of_recommendation
prompt_infos.description: On what basis you recommend fund ? What are the parameters you use for green , yellow , red choosing funds ? What factors do you consider for choosing fund ? How do you select fund ? Aap fund kaise choose karte ho ? What are reason behind choosing fund ? what is th logic / rationale behing selecting fund ? what is your fund selection methodology ? how do you choose fund ?

prompt_infos.name: style_selection_method
prompt_infos.description: How you do STYLE/Factor selection ? What is your methodolgy for STYLE / FACTOR selection ? What is logic behind selecting STYE ? How do you choose Style ?

prompt_infos.name: market_scenario
prompt_infos.description: Answers question regarding current market outlook/scenario, equity market, current equity scores in a year and broader inference from scores, e.g. How is the market condition? market kesa h? What are the scores?

prompt_infos.name: capital_allocation
prompt_infos.description: Asset Allocation Details. Eg. What should be my capital allocation / Broader Asset allocation based on Current market ?

prompt_infos.name: investment_advice
prompt_infos.description: Investment Advice. Eg. Do I go for lumsum or Staggered investment/stp at current juncture ? Should I invest money in STP now? when the system has last told to STOP STP and go into Equity ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_market_view
prompt_infos.description: Debt Market View, Eg. What is current debt market view/allocation ? Broader View on Indian Debt ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_allocation
prompt_infos.description: Debt allocation, eg. Current debt allocation, What should be specific allocation in Debt ? Where should I put my money in Debt ? What should be my allocation in 10 year gsec bsed on interest rate cycle.

prompt_infos.name: large_cap_allocation
prompt_infos.description: Large cap allocation, Eg. What should be Large cap allocation in overall portfolio ?

prompt_infos.name: small_mid_cap_allocation_current
prompt_infos.description: What should be Mid and Small Cap allocation in current portfolio ?

prompt_infos.name: small_mid_cap_allocation_past
prompt_infos.description: What should be Mid and Small Cap allocation in April 2023 ?

prompt_infos.name: small_mid_large_cap_allocation
prompt_infos.description: What should be specific allocation in Large , Mid and Small cap as per current Score / Give me allocation plan / What % should I maintain in Large , Mid and small ? Give me ideal allocation in all caps - i.e large , mid & small  ? How much should I keep in all 3 ?

prompt_infos.name: equity_decision
prompt_infos.description: Answer question related to equity, Ok tell me what shall I do in Equity ?

prompt_infos.name: equity_debt_decision
prompt_infos.description: What is your view on Equity and debt market of india ? Give me the action plan , what shall I do ?

prompt_infos.name: market_fall_undervalue
prompt_infos.description: Will market fall from here or will rise from here ? When should I increase my equity allocation ? When market are under-valued/Favourable ?

prompt_infos.name: market_up_overvalue
prompt_infos.description: When shall I start reducing / trimming  equity allocation ? When Markets are Over-valued / Un-favourable ? When should I start withdrawing money from my equity?

prompt_infos.name: current_market_value
prompt_infos.description: Right - now markets are Over-valued , Fairly or Under-valued ? Is the market currently overvalued or undervalued?

prompt_infos.name: backtesting_broader_guidance_equity
prompt_infos.description: e.g. What is your performance based on broader guidance till now? What is your back-testing result says? What is the outcome if we follow your broader guidance? What performance have you achieved if I followed your equity guidance?

prompt_infos.name: debt_allocation_back_testing
prompt_infos.description: What is the performance of your debt allocation/ back-tested result of your debt allocation ? What is the outcome if I have listened to your debt view ?

prompt_infos.name: mid_small_cap_current_view
prompt_infos.description: What is your current view on Mid and small cap ? / Current action plan for small & midcap as per Mulyankan gpt ? Are midcap / Small cap Overvalued or Under valued or Fairly valued ?

prompt_infos.name: category_selection_under_debt
prompt_infos.description: Which category to select under Debt ? / What category you recommend now in debt ? What was your Debt category selection/recommendation in 2020 June ?

prompt_infos.name: category_selection_under_equity
prompt_infos.description: Which category to select under Equity ? / What category you recommend now in Equity ? What was your Equity category selection/recommendation in 2020 June ?

prompt_infos.name: back_testing_no_profile
prompt_infos.description: Not for equity guidance, only for "No Profile" - What is performance / result / back testing of "no profile" if allocation was implemented as per you / system ?

prompt_infos.name: allocation_reco_no_investor_profile
prompt_infos.description: My Investor Profile is HNI / NO PROFILE / NO GOAL and No Fixed Time horizon. What should be Recommendation / Capital allocation / Asset allocation for him at current juncture.  Where Should I put money for HNI / NO PROFILE / NO GOA AND NO FIXED TIME HORIZON INVESTOR ? What should i do WHO ARE HNI / NO PROFILE / NO GOAL AND NO FIXED TIME HORIZON AT CURRENT MARKET SCENARIO / CONDITION ? What was your allocation recommendation in June 2020 ? I have 50 Lakh rs and my Investor carries NO Profile ? Where should I invest?

prompt_infos.name: aggressive_investor_allocation_reco
prompt_infos.description: My Investor Profile is Aggressive/ have long term horizon. What should be Recommendation / Capital allocation / Asset allocation for him at current juncture.  Where Should I put money for Aggressive investor ? What should i do for aggressive investor AT CURRENT MARKET SCENARIO / CONDITION ?What was your allocation recommendation for Aggressive  in July 2023 ?I have 50 Lakh rs and my Investor carries Aggressive ? Where should I invest?

prompt_infos.name: moderate_investor_allocation_reco
prompt_infos.description: My Investor Profile is Moderate/ Medium term horizon / Moderate Retiree  Looking for Capital withdrawal. What should be Recommendation / Capital allocation / Asset allocation for him at current juncture.  Where Should I put money for Moderate investor ? What should i do for Moderate investor AT CURRENT MARKET SCENARIO / CONDITION ?What was your allocation recommendation for Moderate  in November 2023 ?I have 50 Lakh rs and my Investor carries Moderate/ Moderate Retiree Looking for Caopital withdrawal ? Where should I invest?

prompt_infos.name: conservative_investor_allocation_reco
prompt_infos.description: My Investor Profile is Conservative/ Medium term horizon / Conservative Retiree Looking for Capital withdrawal. What should be Recommendation / Capital allocation / Asset allocation for him at current juncture.  Where Should I put money for Conservative investor ? What should i do for Conservative investor AT CURRENT MARKET SCENARIO / CONDITION ?What was your allocation recommendation for Conservative  in June 2022 ? I have 50 Lakh rs and my Investor carries Conservative/ conservative Retiree  Looking for Caopital withdrawal ? Where should I invest?

prompt_infos.name: style_or_factor_sel_large_cap
prompt_infos.description: Which style / Factor based index to go in Large cap ?

prompt_infos.name: style_or_factor_sel_mid_cap
prompt_infos.description: Which style / Factor based index to go in Large cap ?

prompt_infos.name: style_or_factor_sel_small_cap
prompt_infos.description: Which style / Factor based index to go in Large cap ?

prompt_infos.name: style_or_factor_all_3
prompt_infos.description: what should be my  factor/style capital allocation % in all 3  ? Large cap, mid cap and small cap

prompt_infos.name: performance_style_factor_selection
prompt_infos.description: What is your performance based on  guidance till now for style and factor selection / What is your back-testing result says for Style and factor selection / What is the outcome if we follow your broader guidance on style selection and rotation based o algorithm ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_investment_0_1
prompt_infos.description: I want to invest for 0 to 1 month ? I want to invest into debt for 1 month / upto 1 month ?I want to invest for very very short term / upto 1 month in debt/fixed income  ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_investment_1_3
prompt_infos.description: I want to invest for 1 to 3 month ? I want to invest into debt for 3 month / upto 3 month ?I want to invest for very short duration / upto 3 month in debt/fixed income ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_investment_3_6
prompt_infos.description: I want to invest for 3 to 6 month ? I want to invest into debt for 6 month / upto 6 month ?I want to invest for short duration? I want to invest into debt/fixed income for upto 6 month ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_investment_6_18
prompt_infos.description: I want to invest for 6 to 18 month ? I want to invest into debt for 18 month / upto 18 month ?I want to invest for medium term in debt /fixed income upto 18 month ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_investment_18+
prompt_infos.description: I want to invest for 18 month Plus/Greater than 18 Month  ? I want to invest into debt for more than 18 month /minimum 18 month ? I want to invest in debt with no fixed time horizon ?

prompt_infos.name: SIP_1_6
prompt_infos.description: I want to go for short to medium term SIP ? I want to go for maximum 6 year SIP ?

prompt_infos.name: SIP_6_11
prompt_infos.description: I want to gor for Medium to Long term SIP ?  I want to go for maximum 11 year SIP ?

prompt_infos.name: SIP_12+
prompt_infos.description: I want to gor for Long term SIP ?  I want to go for SIP greater than 12 year ?

prompt_infos.name: pe_pbv_scores
prompt_infos.description: What are  0 , 1 , 2 score for P/E & P/BV ? What are PE scores ? What are PBV Scores ? What is the inference of PE & PBV the score ? What does current score of PE & PBV telling ?

prompt_infos.name: fund_filteration_equity_list
prompt_infos.description: Show me the list of all Equity Category ?

prompt_infos.name: equity_category_color
prompt_infos.description: Give me all Red/yellow/green funds which falls/comes under an equity category ?

prompt_infos.name: priority_funds_equity
prompt_infos.description: Eg : Give me priority / whitelist/accha/ Best / Top / Priority / whitelist / sabse acha / badya / mast fund from provided equity Category e.g. mid cap?

prompt_infos.name: fund_filteration_hybrid_list
prompt_infos.description: Show me the list of all Hybrid Category ?

prompt_infos.name: hybrid_category_color
prompt_infos.description: Give me Red/yellow/green funds which falls/comes under a hybrid category ? hybrid covers only Arbitrage, BAF, Aggressive, Equity Savings (not equity), Conservative, Multi and Dynamic Asset

prompt_infos.name: priority_funds_hybrid
prompt_infos.description: Eg : Give me priority / whitelist/accha/ Best / Top / Priority / whitelist / sabse acha / badya / mast fund from provided hybrid Category ?

prompt_infos.name: fund_filteration_debt_list
prompt_infos.description: Show me the list of all Debt Category ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_category_color
prompt_infos.description: Give me Red/yellow/green funds which falls/comes under a debt category ?

prompt_infos.name: priority_funds_debt
prompt_infos.description: Eg : Give me priority / whitelist/accha/ Best / Top / Priority / whitelist / sabse acha / badya / mast fund from provided a debt Category ?

prompt_infos.name: domestic_sectorial_ranking
prompt_infos.description: Give me top sectors ? Give me sectors where I can overweight ? Which sector do you recommend now ? Any sectoral call or alert ? What are favourable sectors ? Any good sector to invest ? Which sector you will suggest now ?

prompt_infos.name: style_factor_funds
prompt_infos.description: Give me list of style based fund ? What factor funds shall I choose in large or mid or small ? Give me style based fund according to MARINA ? Give me style / factor fund which are favourable ? Give me style/ factor fund which should be avoided ?

prompt_infos.name: index_funds
prompt_infos.description: Give me list of plain vanila index funds ? Give me index funds ? What index funds do you recommend on large or mid or small ?

prompt_infos.name: sector_funds
prompt_infos.description: Give me list of sectoral funds ? What sector fund you will suggest now ? Give me sectoral fund for tactical allocation ? What do you recommend now in sector funds ?

prompt_infos.name: global_funds
prompt_infos.description: Give me list of global funds/country looks attractive ? What global fund you will suggest now ? Give me global fund for tactical allocation ? What do you recommend now in global funds ?

prompt_infos.name: financial_calculation
prompt_infos.description: Example : What should be my sip amount to achieve a corpus of 1 crore in 5 years? I am investing 5 lakh with assumption cagr of 15 % . What will be accumulated corpus after 10 and 15 year ?

prompt_infos.name: past_tactical_calls
prompt_infos.description: What was your past tactical call? What was your past Sectoral call ? What was your past Global call ? What is your performance of past tactical call ? What is your performance of past Sectoral call ? What is your performance of past global alerts ?

prompt_infos.name: fund_type_help
prompt_infos.description: I have invested in dsp mid cap , hdfc small cap and axis bluechip ? Please review /  Please suggest whether these are good funds or not ? I have invested in ICICI balanced advantage , hdfc baf and kotak baf ? Please review /  Please suggest whether these are good funds or not ? I have invested in dsp corporate bond and nippon corporate bond ? What is your view on it ? Please review my funds ? Are my funds good or bad ?
